name: The Handsome Text Collection
description:
A collection of short text games by Hulk Handsome of varying quality. Currently included:

Last Minute
The Minimalist Game
Back to the Future: Marty Quest
Don't Pee Yourself!
Go West
Gourmet Gaffe
Nudists Gone Wild
Who's Angrier?
Zero Bars
Shapeshifter Scourge!
The Great Pancake Detectives - Case #27
Cheesed Off!

DEV NOTES:

If you only play two games in this collection, make them Don't Pee Yourself and Go West. I'm quite proud of those ones! The others are of varying quality, but should still entertain or intrugie.
